title: (x) Pentagram - Modern N� 20 {Hector}
content:
Im sad to admit this, but the name has completly slipped me. Could someone help me I.D. this Bodoni'esk face.

author: Hildebrant

comments.content: I see nothing Bodoni'esk at your link. Could you be more precise?

Would have helped if I spelled it correct. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110142503im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif) Sorry.   
   
 [http://www.pentagram.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110142503/http:/www.pentagram.com/)

It�s Modern N� 20 or Modern Twenty   
   
I think it�s my first type Id.

And congrats on the way your monogram turned out. I remember giving feedback on that some time ago. It looks quite nice.   
   
Cheers!   
   
Hildebrant.
